pages.text: Notice: Most recipes are very close to vanilla, but any recipe ID that contains $(o)Recipe by Finality$() has either been modified or added by me. Please do not ask why my recipes are not working outside the modpack as the answer is very self-explanatory.

Here are some helpful tips from me that may help on your journey.$(br)$(li)If you have not already, press F3 then H to enable advanced tooltips. There is NO NEED to install Mod Name Tooltip or anything similar.

$(li)The search bar of Just Enough Items (JEI) can be quickly accessed from the inventory by pressing two keys: Ctrl + F$(br)$(li)Quark adds hotbar swapping from your inventory when you press Z then 1, 2 or 3.$(br)$(li)Don't engage in losing battles! Always come prepared, even if potion crafting is a bit of a long process.

$(li)Iron, copper, gold and diamonds are easily obtainable AND renewable with the presence of Mystical Agriculture. USE THEM!$(li2)You can also find Inferium Essence throughout the Overworld. Get much of it as you can!

Use Create's Wand of Symmetry to make excavating in the Nether for Ancient Debris blocks easier! You can break 8 blocks around the mirror horizontally with the Octagonal setting or dig a single tunnel with the Mirror on the Z / X axis options!
